title: Canada shooting: 10 dead including suspect in attack on Tumbler Ridge high school, police say
summary_full: More than 25 people are injured, including two with life-threatening injuries, after shooting at secondary school and local residenceLatest updates: ‘devastating’ shooting hits remote town of Tumbler RidgeWhat we know so far about the Tumbler Ridge shootingNine people have been killed and dozens injured after an assailant opened fire at a school in western Canada, in one of the deadliest mass shootings in the country’s history. The suspect was later found dead from what appeared to be a self-inflicted injury.Police found six dead inside the high school in the remote town of Tumbler Ridge in British Columbia, with a further two bodies found at a residence believed to be connected to the incident. Another person died on the way to hospital, the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) said. Continue reading...
